jsonBody.data: {"inf":"POL01","c_id":341113,"cseq":1,"h_id":1865786,"type":"C","valid":"N","caseno":8678951874,"listno":"1st","def_age":40,"def_dob":"31-10-1980","def_sex":"F","def_addr":{"line1":22,"line2":"Waldorf Court","line3":"Cardiff"},"def_name":"Kara Ayers","def_type":"P","offences":{"offence":[{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Newcastle assaulted Short Pearson by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.","sum":"On 01/01/2015 at Ronbert, Bangor, stole COMPUTER to the value of Â£987.00, belonging to Evans Winters.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Theft from a shop","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at London assaulted Maynard Huff by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 39 of the Criminal Justice Act 1988.","sum":"On 01/01/2016 at Manchester assaulted Puckett Terry by beating him.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Assault by beating","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"},{"as":"Contrary to section 1(1) of the Criminal Attempts Act 1981.","sum":"On 05/09/2016 at Bangor attempted to steal MOTORCYCLE to the value of 750.00, belonging to Sanders Guthrie.","code":"TH68010","oseq":1,"co_id":1142407,"title":"Attempt theft from the person of another","maxpen":"EW: 6M &/or Ultd Fine"}]}}
